definitions: the quality of being able to be used or obtained

examples.text: turkey producers had been losing sales because of the all-year-round availability of beef
the cost and availability of housing for teachers still remains a problem

shortDefinitions: quality of being able to be used or obtained

definitions: the state of being otherwise unoccupied; freedom to do something

examples.text: they inquired as to my availability for a game the following evening

definitions: the state of not being currently involved in a sexual or romantic relationship

examples.text: if you call yourself 'Miss' you're advertising your availability to any man who takes a fancy

shortDefinitions: state of not being currently involved in sexual or romantic relationship
